00025 /*
00026  * lustre/obdclass/local_storage.c
00027  *
00028  * Local storage for file/objects with fid generation. Works on top of OSD.
00029  *
00030  * Author: Mikhail Pershin <mike.pershin@intel.com>
00031  */
00032 
00033 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00034 
00035 #include "local_storage.h"
00036 
00037 /* all initialized local storages on this node are linked on this */
00038 static struct list_head ls_list_head = LIST_HEAD_INIT(ls_list_head);
00039 static DEFINE_MUTEX(ls_list_mutex);
00040 
00041 static int ls_object_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *o,
00042                           const struct lu_object_conf *unused)
00043 {
00044         struct ls_device        *ls;
00045         struct lu_object        *below;
00046         struct lu_device        *under;
00047 
00048         ENTRY;
00049 
00050         ls = container_of0(o->lo_dev, struct ls_device, ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev);
00051         under = &ls->ls_osd->dd_lu_dev;
00052         below = under->ld_ops->ldo_object_alloc(env, o->lo_header, under);
00053         if (below == NULL)
00054                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00055 
00056         lu_object_add(o, below);
00057 
00058         RETURN(0);
00059 }
00060 
00061 static void ls_object_free(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *o)
00062 {
00063         struct ls_object        *obj = lu2ls_obj(o);
00064         struct lu_object_header *h = o->lo_header;
00065 
00066         dt_object_fini(&obj->ls_obj);
00067         lu_object_header_fini(h);
00068         OBD_FREE_PTR(obj);
00069 }
00070 
00071 static struct lu_object_operations ls_lu_obj_ops = {
00072         .loo_object_init  = ls_object_init,
00073         .loo_object_free  = ls_object_free,
00074 };
00075 
00076 static struct lu_object *ls_object_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00077                                          const struct lu_object_header *_h,
00078                                          struct lu_device *d)
00079 {
00080         struct lu_object_header *h;
00081         struct ls_object        *o;
00082         struct lu_object        *l;
00083 
00084         LASSERT(_h == NULL);
00085 
00086         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(o);
00087         if (o != NULL) {
00088                 l = &o->ls_obj.do_lu;
00089                 h = &o->ls_header;
00090 
00091                 lu_object_header_init(h);
00092                 dt_object_init(&o->ls_obj, h, d);
00093                 lu_object_add_top(h, l);
00094 
00095                 l->lo_ops = &ls_lu_obj_ops;
00096 
00097                 return l;
00098         } else {
00099                 return NULL;
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00103 static struct lu_device_operations ls_lu_dev_ops = {
00104         .ldo_object_alloc =     ls_object_alloc
00105 };
00106 
00107 static struct ls_device *__ls_find_dev(struct dt_device *dev)
00108 {
00109         struct ls_device *ls, *ret = NULL;
00110 
00111         list_for_each_entry(ls, &ls_list_head, ls_linkage) {
00112                 if (ls->ls_osd == dev) {
00113                         atomic_inc(&ls->ls_refcount);
00114                         ret = ls;
00115                         break;
00116                 }
00117         }
00118         return ret;
00119 }
00120 
00121 struct ls_device *ls_find_dev(struct dt_device *dev)
00122 {
00123         struct ls_device *ls;
00124 
00125         mutex_lock(&ls_list_mutex);
00126         ls = __ls_find_dev(dev);
00127         mutex_unlock(&ls_list_mutex);
00128 
00129         return ls;
00130 }
00131 
00132 static struct lu_device_type_operations ls_device_type_ops = {
00133         .ldto_start = NULL,
00134         .ldto_stop  = NULL,
00135 };
00136 
00137 static struct lu_device_type ls_lu_type = {
00138         .ldt_name = "local_storage",
00139         .ldt_ops  = &ls_device_type_ops,
00140 };
00141 
00142 struct ls_device *ls_device_get(struct dt_device *dev)
00143 {
00144         struct ls_device *ls;
00145 
00146         ENTRY;
00147 
00148         mutex_lock(&ls_list_mutex);
00149         ls = __ls_find_dev(dev);
00150         if (ls)
00151                 GOTO(out_ls, ls);
00152 
00153         /* not found, then create */
00154         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ls);
00155         if (ls == NULL)
00156                 GOTO(out_ls, ls = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00157 
00158         atomic_set(&ls->ls_refcount, 1);
00159         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ls->ls_los_list);
00160         mutex_init(&ls->ls_los_mutex);
00161 
00162         ls->ls_osd = dev;
00163 
00164         LASSERT(dev->dd_lu_dev.ld_site);
00165         lu_device_init(&ls->ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev, &ls_lu_type);
00166         ls->ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_ops = &ls_lu_dev_ops;
00167         ls->ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site = dev->dd_lu_dev.ld_site;
00168 
00169         /* finally add ls to the list */
00170         list_add(&ls->ls_linkage, &ls_list_head);
00171 out_ls:
00172         mutex_unlock(&ls_list_mutex);
00173         RETURN(ls);
00174 }
00175 
00176 void ls_device_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct ls_device *ls)
00177 {
00178         LASSERT(env);
00179         if (!atomic_dec_and_test(&ls->ls_refcount))
00180                 return;
00181 
00182         mutex_lock(&ls_list_mutex);
00183         if (atomic_read(&ls->ls_refcount) == 0) {
00184                 LASSERT(list_empty(&ls->ls_los_list));
00185                 list_del(&ls->ls_linkage);
00186                 lu_site_purge(env, ls->ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev.ld_site, ~0);
00187                 lu_device_fini(&ls->ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev);
00188                 OBD_FREE_PTR(ls);
00189         }
00190         mutex_unlock(&ls_list_mutex);
00191 }
00192 
00196 int local_object_fid_generate(const struct lu_env *env,
00197                               struct local_oid_storage *los,
00198                               struct lu_fid *fid)
00199 {
00200         LASSERT(los->los_dev);
00201         LASSERT(los->los_obj);
00202 
00203         /* take next OID */
00204 
00205         /* to make it unique after reboot we store
00206          * the latest generated fid atomically with
00207          * object creation see local_object_create() */
00208 
00209         mutex_lock(&los->los_id_lock);
00210         fid->f_seq = los->los_seq;
00211         fid->f_oid = ++los->los_last_oid;
00212         fid->f_ver = 0;
00213         mutex_unlock(&los->los_id_lock);
00214 
00215         return 0;
00216 }
00217 
00218 int local_object_declare_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00219                                 struct local_oid_storage *los,
00220                                 struct dt_object *o, struct lu_attr *attr,
00221                                 struct dt_object_format *dof,
00222                                 struct thandle *th)
00223 {
00224         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00225         int                      rc;
00226 
00227         ENTRY;
00228 
00229         /* update fid generation file */
00230         if (los != NULL) {
00231                 LASSERT(dt_object_exists(los->los_obj));
00232                 dti->dti_lb.lb_buf = NULL;
00233                 dti->dti_lb.lb_len = sizeof(struct los_ondisk);
00234                 rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, los->los_obj,
00235                                              &dti->dti_lb, 0, th);
00236                 if (rc)
00237                         RETURN(rc);
00238         }
00239 
00240         rc = dt_declare_create(env, o, attr, NULL, dof, th);
00241         if (rc)
00242                 RETURN(rc);
00243 
00244         dti->dti_lb.lb_buf = NULL;
00245         dti->dti_lb.lb_len = sizeof(dti->dti_lma);
00246         rc = dt_declare_xattr_set(env, o, &dti->dti_lb, XATTR_NAME_LMA, 0, th);
00247 
00248         RETURN(rc);
00249 }
00250 
00251 int local_object_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00252                         struct local_oid_storage *los,
00253                         struct dt_object *o, struct lu_attr *attr,
00254                         struct dt_object_format *dof, struct thandle *th)
00255 {
00256         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00257         u64                      lastid;
00258         int                      rc;
00259 
00260         ENTRY;
00261 
00262         rc = dt_create(env, o, attr, NULL, dof, th);
00263         if (rc)
00264                 RETURN(rc);
00265 
00266         if (los == NULL)
00267                 RETURN(rc);
00268 
00269         LASSERT(los->los_obj);
00270         LASSERT(dt_object_exists(los->los_obj));
00271 
00272         /* many threads can be updated this, serialize
00273          * them here to avoid the race where one thread
00274          * takes the value first, but writes it last */
00275         mutex_lock(&los->los_id_lock);
00276 
00277         /* update local oid number on disk so that
00278          * we know the last one used after reboot */
00279         lastid = cpu_to_le64(los->los_last_oid);
00280 
00281         dti->dti_off = 0;
00282         dti->dti_lb.lb_buf = &lastid;
00283         dti->dti_lb.lb_len = sizeof(lastid);
00284         rc = dt_record_write(env, los->los_obj, &dti->dti_lb, &dti->dti_off,
00285                              th);
00286         mutex_unlock(&los->los_id_lock);
00287 
00288         RETURN(rc);
00289 }
00290 
00291 /*
00292  * Create local named object (file, directory or index) in parent directory.
00293  */
00294 static struct dt_object *__local_file_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00295                                              const struct lu_fid *fid,
00296                                              struct local_oid_storage *los,
00297                                              struct ls_device *ls,
00298                                              struct dt_object *parent,
00299                                              const char *name,
00300                                              struct lu_attr *attr,
00301                                              struct dt_object_format *dof)
00302 {
00303         struct dt_thread_info   *dti    = dt_info(env);
00304         struct lu_object_conf   *conf   = &dti->dti_conf;
00305         struct dt_insert_rec    *rec    = &dti->dti_dt_rec;
00306         struct dt_object        *dto;
00307         struct thandle          *th;
00308         int                      rc;
00309 
00310         /* We know that the target object does not exist, to be created,
00311          * then give some hints - LOC_F_NEW to help low layer to handle
00312          * that efficiently and properly. */
00313         memset(conf, 0, sizeof(*conf));
00314         conf->loc_flags = LOC_F_NEW;
00315         dto = ls_locate(env, ls, fid, conf);
00316         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(dto)))
00317                 RETURN(dto);
00318 
00319         LASSERT(dto != NULL);
00320         if (dt_object_exists(dto))
00321                 GOTO(out, rc = -EEXIST);
00322 
00323         th = dt_trans_create(env, ls->ls_osd);
00324         if (IS_ERR(th))
00325                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00326 
00327         rc = local_object_declare_create(env, los, dto, attr, dof, th);
00328         if (rc)
00329                 GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00330 
00331         if (dti->dti_dof.dof_type == DFT_DIR) {
00332                 rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, dto, th);
00333                 if (rc < 0)
00334                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00335 
00336                 rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, parent, th);
00337                 if (rc < 0)
00338                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00339         }
00340 
00341         rec->rec_fid = fid;
00342         rec->rec_type = attr->la_mode & S_IFMT;
00343         rc = dt_declare_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00344                                (const struct dt_key *)name, th);
00345         if (rc)
00346                 GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00347 
00348         if (dti->dti_dof.dof_type == DFT_DIR) {
00349                 if (!dt_try_as_dir(env, dto))
00350                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc = -ENOTDIR);
00351 
00352                 rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00353                 rec->rec_fid = fid;
00354                 rc = dt_declare_insert(env, dto, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00355                                 (const struct dt_key *)".", th);
00356                 if (rc != 0)
00357                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00358 
00359                 rec->rec_fid = lu_object_fid(&parent->do_lu);
00360                 rc = dt_declare_insert(env, dto, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00361                                 (const struct dt_key *)"..", th);
00362                 if (rc != 0)
00363                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00364 
00365                 rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, dto, th);
00366                 if (rc != 0)
00367                         GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00368         }
00369 
00370         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, ls->ls_osd, th);
00371         if (rc)
00372                 GOTO(trans_stop, rc);
00373 
00374         dt_write_lock(env, dto, LOS_CHILD);
00375         if (dt_object_exists(dto))
00376                 GOTO(unlock, rc = 0);
00377 
00378         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "create new object "DFID"\n",
00379                PFID(lu_object_fid(&dto->do_lu)));
00380         rc = local_object_create(env, los, dto, attr, dof, th);
00381         if (rc)
00382                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00383         LASSERT(dt_object_exists(dto));
00384 
00385         if (dti->dti_dof.dof_type == DFT_DIR) {
00386 
00387                 rec->rec_type = S_IFDIR;
00388                 rec->rec_fid = fid;
00389                 /* Add "." and ".." for newly created dir */
00390                 rc = dt_insert(env, dto, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00391                                (const struct dt_key *)".", th, 1);
00392                 if (rc != 0)
00393                         GOTO(destroy, rc);
00394 
00395                 dt_ref_add(env, dto, th);
00396                 rec->rec_fid = lu_object_fid(&parent->do_lu);
00397                 rc = dt_insert(env, dto, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00398                                (const struct dt_key *)"..", th, 1);
00399                 if (rc != 0)
00400                         GOTO(destroy, rc);
00401         }
00402 
00403         rec->rec_fid = fid;
00404         rec->rec_type = dto->do_lu.lo_header->loh_attr;
00405         dt_write_lock(env, parent, LOS_PARENT);
00406         rc = dt_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00407                        (const struct dt_key *)name, th, 1);
00408         if (dti->dti_dof.dof_type == DFT_DIR)
00409                 dt_ref_add(env, parent, th);
00410         dt_write_unlock(env, parent);
00411         if (rc)
00412                 GOTO(destroy, rc);
00413 destroy:
00414         if (rc)
00415                 dt_destroy(env, dto, th);
00416 unlock:
00417         dt_write_unlock(env, dto);
00418 trans_stop:
00419         dt_trans_stop(env, ls->ls_osd, th);
00420 out:
00421         if (rc) {
00422                 lu_object_put_nocache(env, &dto->do_lu);
00423                 dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00424         }
00425         RETURN(dto);
00426 }
00427 
00428 /*
00429  * Look up and create (if it does not exist) a local named file or directory in
00430  * parent directory.
00431  */
00432 struct dt_object *local_file_find_or_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00433                                             struct local_oid_storage *los,
00434                                             struct dt_object *parent,
00435                                             const char *name, __u32 mode)
00436 {
00437         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00438         struct dt_object        *dto;
00439         int                      rc;
00440 
00441         LASSERT(parent);
00442 
00443         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, parent, name, &dti->dti_fid);
00444         if (rc == 0)
00445                 /* name is found, get the object */
00446                 dto = ls_locate(env, dt2ls_dev(los->los_dev),
00447                                 &dti->dti_fid, NULL);
00448         else if (rc != -ENOENT)
00449                 dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00450         else {
00451                 rc = local_object_fid_generate(env, los, &dti->dti_fid);
00452                 if (rc < 0) {
00453                         dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00454                 } else {
00455                         /* create the object */
00456                         dti->dti_attr.la_valid  = LA_MODE;
00457                         dti->dti_attr.la_mode   = mode;
00458                         dti->dti_dof.dof_type   = dt_mode_to_dft(mode & S_IFMT);
00459                         dto = __local_file_create(env, &dti->dti_fid, los,
00460                                                   dt2ls_dev(los->los_dev),
00461                                                   parent, name, &dti->dti_attr,
00462                                                   &dti->dti_dof);
00463                 }
00464         }
00465         return dto;
00466 }
00467 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_file_find_or_create);
00468 
00469 struct dt_object *local_file_find_or_create_with_fid(const struct lu_env *env,
00470                                                      struct dt_device *dt,
00471                                                      const struct lu_fid *fid,
00472                                                      struct dt_object *parent,
00473                                                      const char *name,
00474                                                      __u32 mode)
00475 {
00476         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00477         struct dt_object        *dto;
00478         int                      rc;
00479 
00480         LASSERT(parent);
00481 
00482         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, parent, name, &dti->dti_fid);
00483         if (rc == 0) {
00484                 dto = dt_locate(env, dt, &dti->dti_fid);
00485         } else if (rc != -ENOENT) {
00486                 dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00487         } else {
00488                 struct ls_device *ls;
00489 
00490                 ls = ls_device_get(dt);
00491                 if (IS_ERR(ls)) {
00492                         dto = ERR_PTR(PTR_ERR(ls));
00493                 } else {
00494                         /* create the object */
00495                         dti->dti_attr.la_valid  = LA_MODE;
00496                         dti->dti_attr.la_mode   = mode;
00497                         dti->dti_dof.dof_type   = dt_mode_to_dft(mode & S_IFMT);
00498                         dto = __local_file_create(env, fid, NULL, ls, parent,
00499                                                   name, &dti->dti_attr,
00500                                                   &dti->dti_dof);
00501                         /* ls_device_put() will finalize the ls device, we
00502                          * have to open the object in other device stack */
00503                         if (!IS_ERR(dto)) {
00504                                 dti->dti_fid = dto->do_lu.lo_header->loh_fid;
00505                                 lu_object_put_nocache(env, &dto->do_lu);
00506                                 dto = dt_locate(env, dt, &dti->dti_fid);
00507                         }
00508                         ls_device_put(env, ls);
00509                 }
00510         }
00511         return dto;
00512 }
00513 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_file_find_or_create_with_fid);
00514 
00515 /*
00516  * Look up and create (if it does not exist) a local named index file in parent
00517  * directory.
00518  */
00519 struct dt_object *local_index_find_or_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00520                                              struct local_oid_storage *los,
00521                                              struct dt_object *parent,
00522                                              const char *name, __u32 mode,
00523                                              const struct dt_index_features *ft)
00524 {
00525         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00526         struct dt_object        *dto;
00527         int                      rc;
00528 
00529         LASSERT(parent);
00530 
00531         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, parent, name, &dti->dti_fid);
00532         if (rc == 0) {
00533                 /* name is found, get the object */
00534                 dto = ls_locate(env, dt2ls_dev(los->los_dev),
00535                                 &dti->dti_fid, NULL);
00536         } else if (rc != -ENOENT) {
00537                 dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00538         } else {
00539                 rc = local_object_fid_generate(env, los, &dti->dti_fid);
00540                 if (rc < 0) {
00541                         dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00542                 } else {
00543                         /* create the object */
00544                         dti->dti_attr.la_valid          = LA_MODE;
00545                         dti->dti_attr.la_mode           = mode;
00546                         dti->dti_dof.dof_type           = DFT_INDEX;
00547                         dti->dti_dof.u.dof_idx.di_feat  = ft;
00548                         dto = __local_file_create(env, &dti->dti_fid, los,
00549                                                   dt2ls_dev(los->los_dev),
00550                                                   parent, name, &dti->dti_attr,
00551                                                   &dti->dti_dof);
00552                 }
00553         }
00554         return dto;
00555 
00556 }
00557 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_index_find_or_create);
00558 
00559 struct dt_object *
00560 local_index_find_or_create_with_fid(const struct lu_env *env,
00561                                     struct dt_device *dt,
00562                                     const struct lu_fid *fid,
00563                                     struct dt_object *parent,
00564                                     const char *name, __u32 mode,
00565                                     const struct dt_index_features *ft)
00566 {
00567         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00568         struct dt_object        *dto;
00569         int                      rc;
00570 
00571         LASSERT(parent);
00572 
00573         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, parent, name, &dti->dti_fid);
00574         if (rc == 0) {
00575                 /* name is found, get the object */
00576                 if (!lu_fid_eq(fid, &dti->dti_fid))
00577                         dto = ERR_PTR(-EINVAL);
00578                 else
00579                         dto = dt_locate(env, dt, fid);
00580         } else if (rc != -ENOENT) {
00581                 dto = ERR_PTR(rc);
00582         } else {
00583                 struct ls_device *ls;
00584 
00585                 ls = ls_device_get(dt);
00586                 if (IS_ERR(ls)) {
00587                         dto = ERR_PTR(PTR_ERR(ls));
00588                 } else {
00589                         /* create the object */
00590                         dti->dti_attr.la_valid          = LA_MODE;
00591                         dti->dti_attr.la_mode           = mode;
00592                         dti->dti_dof.dof_type           = DFT_INDEX;
00593                         dti->dti_dof.u.dof_idx.di_feat  = ft;
00594                         dto = __local_file_create(env, fid, NULL, ls, parent,
00595                                                   name, &dti->dti_attr,
00596                                                   &dti->dti_dof);
00597                         /* ls_device_put() will finalize the ls device, we
00598                          * have to open the object in other device stack */
00599                         if (!IS_ERR(dto)) {
00600                                 dti->dti_fid = dto->do_lu.lo_header->loh_fid;
00601                                 lu_object_put_nocache(env, &dto->do_lu);
00602                                 dto = dt_locate(env, dt, &dti->dti_fid);
00603                         }
00604                         ls_device_put(env, ls);
00605                 }
00606         }
00607         return dto;
00608 }
00609 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_index_find_or_create_with_fid);
00610 
00611 static int local_object_declare_unlink(const struct lu_env *env,
00612                                        struct dt_device *dt,
00613                                        struct dt_object *p,
00614                                        struct dt_object *c, const char *name,
00615                                        struct thandle *th)
00616 {
00617         int rc;
00618 
00619         rc = dt_declare_delete(env, p, (const struct dt_key *)name, th);
00620         if (rc < 0)
00621                 return rc;
00622 
00623         rc = dt_declare_ref_del(env, c, th);
00624         if (rc < 0)
00625                 return rc;
00626 
00627         return dt_declare_destroy(env, c, th);
00628 }
00629 
00630 int local_object_unlink(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *dt,
00631                         struct dt_object *parent, const char *name)
00632 {
00633         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00634         struct dt_object        *dto;
00635         struct thandle          *th;
00636         int                      rc;
00637 
00638         ENTRY;
00639 
00640         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, parent, name, &dti->dti_fid);
00641         if (rc == -ENOENT)
00642                 RETURN(0);
00643         else if (rc < 0)
00644                 RETURN(rc);
00645 
00646         dto = dt_locate(env, dt, &dti->dti_fid);
00647         if (unlikely(IS_ERR(dto)))
00648                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(dto));
00649 
00650         th = dt_trans_create(env, dt);
00651         if (IS_ERR(th))
00652                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00653 
00654         rc = local_object_declare_unlink(env, dt, parent, dto, name, th);
00655         if (rc < 0)
00656                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00657 
00658         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dt, th);
00659         if (rc < 0)
00660                 GOTO(stop, rc);
00661 
00662         dt_write_lock(env, dto, 0);
00663         rc = dt_delete(env, parent, (struct dt_key *)name, th);
00664         if (rc < 0)
00665                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00666 
00667         rc = dt_ref_del(env, dto, th);
00668         if (rc < 0) {
00669                 struct dt_insert_rec *rec = &dti->dti_dt_rec;
00670 
00671                 rec->rec_fid = &dti->dti_fid;
00672                 rec->rec_type = dto->do_lu.lo_header->loh_attr;
00673                 rc = dt_insert(env, parent, (const struct dt_rec *)rec,
00674                                (const struct dt_key *)name, th, 1);
00675                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
00676         }
00677 
00678         rc = dt_destroy(env, dto, th);
00679 unlock:
00680         dt_write_unlock(env, dto);
00681 stop:
00682         dt_trans_stop(env, dt, th);
00683 out:
00684         lu_object_put_nocache(env, &dto->do_lu);
00685         return rc;
00686 }
00687 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_object_unlink);
00688 
00689 struct local_oid_storage *dt_los_find(struct ls_device *ls, __u64 seq)
00690 {
00691         struct local_oid_storage *los, *ret = NULL;
00692 
00693         list_for_each_entry(los, &ls->ls_los_list, los_list) {
00694                 if (los->los_seq == seq) {
00695                         atomic_inc(&los->los_refcount);
00696                         ret = los;
00697                         break;
00698                 }
00699         }
00700         return ret;
00701 }
00702 
00703 void dt_los_put(struct local_oid_storage *los)
00704 {
00705         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&los->los_refcount))
00706                 /* should never happen, only local_oid_storage_fini should
00707                  * drop refcount to zero */
00708                 LBUG();
00709         return;
00710 }
00711 
00712 /* after Lustre 2.3 release there may be old file to store last generated FID
00713  * If such file exists then we have to read its content
00714  */
00715 static int lastid_compat_check(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *dev,
00716                                __u64 lastid_seq, __u32 *first_oid,
00717                                struct ls_device *ls)
00718 {
00719         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00720         struct dt_object        *root = NULL;
00721         struct los_ondisk        losd;
00722         struct dt_object        *o = NULL;
00723         int                      rc = 0;
00724 
00725         rc = dt_root_get(env, dev, &dti->dti_fid);
00726         if (rc)
00727                 return rc;
00728 
00729         root = ls_locate(env, ls, &dti->dti_fid, NULL);
00730         if (IS_ERR(root))
00731                 return PTR_ERR(root);
00732 
00733         /* find old last_id file */
00734         snprintf(dti->dti_buf, sizeof(dti->dti_buf), "seq-"LPX64"-lastid",
00735                  lastid_seq);
00736         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, root, dti->dti_buf, &dti->dti_fid);
00737         lu_object_put_nocache(env, &root->do_lu);
00738         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00739                 /* old llog lastid accessed by FID only */
00740                 if (lastid_seq != FID_SEQ_LLOG)
00741                         return 0;
00742                 dti->dti_fid.f_seq = FID_SEQ_LLOG;
00743                 dti->dti_fid.f_oid = 1;
00744                 dti->dti_fid.f_ver = 0;
00745                 o = ls_locate(env, ls, &dti->dti_fid, NULL);
00746                 if (IS_ERR(o))
00747                         return PTR_ERR(o);
00748 
00749                 if (!dt_object_exists(o)) {
00750                         lu_object_put_nocache(env, &o->do_lu);
00751                         return 0;
00752                 }
00753                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Found old llog lastid file\n");
00754         } else if (rc < 0) {
00755                 return rc;
00756         } else {
00757                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Found old lastid file for sequence "LPX64"\n",
00758                        lastid_seq);
00759                 o = ls_locate(env, ls, &dti->dti_fid, NULL);
00760                 if (IS_ERR(o))
00761                         return PTR_ERR(o);
00762         }
00763         /* let's read seq-NNNNNN-lastid file value */
00764         LASSERT(dt_object_exists(o));
00765         dti->dti_off = 0;
00766         dti->dti_lb.lb_buf = &losd;
00767         dti->dti_lb.lb_len = sizeof(losd);
00768         dt_read_lock(env, o, 0);
00769         rc = dt_record_read(env, o, &dti->dti_lb, &dti->dti_off);
00770         dt_read_unlock(env, o);
00771         if (rc == 0 && le32_to_cpu(losd.lso_magic) != LOS_MAGIC) {
00772                 CERROR("%s: wrong content of seq-"LPX64"-lastid file, magic %x\n",
00773                        o->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name, lastid_seq,
00774                        le32_to_cpu(losd.lso_magic));
00775                 rc = -EINVAL;
00776         } else if (rc < 0) {
00777                 CERROR("%s: failed to read seq-"LPX64"-lastid: rc = %d\n",
00778                        o->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name, lastid_seq, rc);
00779         }
00780         lu_object_put_nocache(env, &o->do_lu);
00781         if (rc == 0)
00782                 *first_oid = le32_to_cpu(losd.lso_next_oid);
00783         return rc;
00784 }
00785 
00803 int local_oid_storage_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *dev,
00804                            const struct lu_fid *first_fid,
00805                            struct local_oid_storage **los)
00806 {
00807         struct dt_thread_info   *dti = dt_info(env);
00808         struct ls_device        *ls;
00809         u64                      lastid;
00810         struct dt_object        *o = NULL;
00811         struct thandle          *th;
00812         __u32                    first_oid = fid_oid(first_fid);
00813         int                      rc = 0;
00814 
00815         ENTRY;
00816 
00817         ls = ls_device_get(dev);
00818         if (IS_ERR(ls))
00819                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(ls));
00820 
00821         mutex_lock(&ls->ls_los_mutex);
00822         *los = dt_los_find(ls, fid_seq(first_fid));
00823         if (*los != NULL)
00824                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00825 
00826         /* not found, then create */
00827         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(*los);
00828         if (*los == NULL)
00829                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00830 
00831         atomic_set(&(*los)->los_refcount, 1);
00832         mutex_init(&(*los)->los_id_lock);
00833         (*los)->los_dev = &ls->ls_top_dev;
00834         atomic_inc(&ls->ls_refcount);
00835         list_add(&(*los)->los_list, &ls->ls_los_list);
00836 
00837         /* Use {seq, 0, 0} to create the LAST_ID file for every
00838          * sequence.  OIDs start at LUSTRE_FID_INIT_OID.
00839          */
00840         dti->dti_fid.f_seq = fid_seq(first_fid);
00841         dti->dti_fid.f_oid = LUSTRE_FID_LASTID_OID;
00842         dti->dti_fid.f_ver = 0;
00843         o = ls_locate(env, ls, &dti->dti_fid, NULL);
00844         if (IS_ERR(o))
00845                 GOTO(out_los, rc = PTR_ERR(o));
00846 
00847         if (!dt_object_exists(o)) {
00848                 rc = lastid_compat_check(env, dev, fid_seq(first_fid),
00849                                          &first_oid, ls);
00850                 if (rc < 0)
00851                         GOTO(out_los, rc);
00852 
00853                 th = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
00854                 if (IS_ERR(th))
00855                         GOTO(out_los, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00856 
00857                 dti->dti_attr.la_valid = LA_MODE | LA_TYPE;
00858                 dti->dti_attr.la_mode = S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR;
00859                 dti->dti_dof.dof_type = dt_mode_to_dft(S_IFREG);
00860 
00861                 rc = dt_declare_create(env, o, &dti->dti_attr, NULL,
00862                                        &dti->dti_dof, th);
00863                 if (rc)
00864                         GOTO(out_trans, rc);
00865 
00866                 lastid = cpu_to_le64(first_oid);
00867 
00868                 dti->dti_off = 0;
00869                 dti->dti_lb.lb_buf = &lastid;
00870                 dti->dti_lb.lb_len = sizeof(lastid);
00871                 rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, o, &dti->dti_lb, dti->dti_off,
00872                                              th);
00873                 if (rc)
00874                         GOTO(out_trans, rc);
00875 
00876                 rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, th);
00877                 if (rc)
00878                         GOTO(out_trans, rc);
00879 
00880                 dt_write_lock(env, o, 0);
00881                 if (dt_object_exists(o))
00882                         GOTO(out_lock, rc = 0);
00883 
00884                 rc = dt_create(env, o, &dti->dti_attr, NULL, &dti->dti_dof,
00885                                th);
00886                 if (rc)
00887                         GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00888 
00889                 rc = dt_record_write(env, o, &dti->dti_lb, &dti->dti_off, th);
00890                 if (rc)
00891                         GOTO(out_lock, rc);
00892 out_lock:
00893                 dt_write_unlock(env, o);
00894 out_trans:
00895                 dt_trans_stop(env, dev, th);
00896         } else {
00897                 dti->dti_off = 0;
00898                 dti->dti_lb.lb_buf = &lastid;
00899                 dti->dti_lb.lb_len = sizeof(lastid);
00900                 dt_read_lock(env, o, 0);
00901                 rc = dt_record_read(env, o, &dti->dti_lb, &dti->dti_off);
00902                 dt_read_unlock(env, o);
00903                 if (rc == 0 && le64_to_cpu(lastid) > OBIF_MAX_OID) {
00904                         CERROR("%s: bad oid "LPU64" is read from LAST_ID\n",
00905                                o->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name,
00906                                le64_to_cpu(lastid));
00907                         rc = -EINVAL;
00908                 }
00909         }
00910 out_los:
00911         if (rc != 0) {
00912                 list_del(&(*los)->los_list);
00913                 atomic_dec(&ls->ls_refcount);
00914                 OBD_FREE_PTR(*los);
00915                 *los = NULL;
00916                 if (o != NULL && !IS_ERR(o))
00917                         lu_object_put_nocache(env, &o->do_lu);
00918         } else {
00919                 (*los)->los_seq = fid_seq(first_fid);
00920                 (*los)->los_last_oid = le64_to_cpu(lastid);
00921                 (*los)->los_obj = o;
00922                 /* Read value should not be less than initial one
00923                  * but possible after upgrade from older fs.
00924                  * In this case just switch to the first_oid in memory and
00925                  * it will be updated on disk with first object generated */
00926                 if ((*los)->los_last_oid < first_oid)
00927                         (*los)->los_last_oid = first_oid;
00928         }
00929 out:
00930         mutex_unlock(&ls->ls_los_mutex);
00931         ls_device_put(env, ls);
00932         return rc;
00933 }
00934 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_oid_storage_init);
00935 
00936 void local_oid_storage_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00937                             struct local_oid_storage *los)
00938 {
00939         struct ls_device *ls;
00940 
00941         LASSERT(env);
00942         LASSERT(los->los_dev);
00943         ls = dt2ls_dev(los->los_dev);
00944 
00945         /* Take the mutex before decreasing the reference to avoid race
00946          * conditions as described in LU-4721. */
00947         mutex_lock(&ls->ls_los_mutex);
00948         if (!atomic_dec_and_test(&los->los_refcount)) {
00949                 mutex_unlock(&ls->ls_los_mutex);
00950                 return;
00951         }
00952 
00953         if (los->los_obj)
00954                 lu_object_put_nocache(env, &los->los_obj->do_lu);
00955         list_del(&los->los_list);
00956         OBD_FREE_PTR(los);
00957         mutex_unlock(&ls->ls_los_mutex);
00958         ls_device_put(env, ls);
00959 }
00960 EXPORT_SYMBOL(local_oid_storage_fini);
